Techs.Name: Palming
Techs.Description: Concealing or switching objects unnoticed through refined hand techniques.

Techs.Name: Manual Control
Techs.Description: Employing skilled, rapid hand maneuvers to render object movements untraceable.

Techs.Name: Props Usage
Techs.Description: Designing and using specialized props to enhance effects at a detailed scale.

Techs.Name: Visual Illusions
Techs.Description: Utilizing light, mirrors, or similar methods to create deceptive appearances.

Techs.Name: Timing Control
Techs.Description: Precisely adjusting action intervals to ensure continuous mystery.

Techs.Name: Memory Techniques
Techs.Description: Applying mnemonic methods to record and retrieve audience data, enabling subtle mental effects.

Techs.Name: Invisible Cues
Techs.Description: Embedding hidden marks or signals to facilitate subsequent actions.

Techs.Name: Quick Changes
Techs.Description: Performing rapid transitions to alter objects or positions instantly.

Techs.Name: Two-Handed Operation
Techs.Description: Coordinating both hands simultaneously to achieve complex manipulations.

Techs.Name: Device Assistance
Techs.Description: Employing concealed tools or mechanisms to realize seemingly impossible tricks.

Techs.Name: Substitution Techniques
Techs.Description: Swiftly exchanging items to maintain illusions without detection.

Techs.Name: Marked Hidden Marks
Techs.Description: Placing subtle indicators on props or surfaces to guide future moves.

Techs.Name: Costume Changes
Techs.Description: Rapidly altering attire or props to shift appearance or function.

Techs.Name: Mirror Displacement
Techs.Description: Using reflective elements to produce vanish-and-reappear illusions.

Techs.Name: Multiplication
Techs.Description: Arranging actions and props to create the impression of multiple simultaneous presences.

Techs.Name: Floating and Flying
Techs.Description: Employing hidden supports or equipment to make objects or the performer appear to float or fly.
